entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:06 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -20.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 7:03 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -20.4°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -22.4°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then cloudy with snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
